footer.about: K-MARA HEALTHCARE: Revolutionizing emergency cardiac diagnostics with rapid, precise technology.
footer.copyright: © {year} K-MARA HEALTHCARE, S.L. All rights reserved.

hero.subtitle: Our innovative point-of-care test for chest pain delivers results in minutes, enabling doctors to act with speed and confidence when every second counts.

home_introduction.title: Redefining Emergency Cardiac Diagnostics
home_introduction.subtitle: In the race against time, precision and speed are everything. K-MARA introduces a game-changing solution for risk stratification of chest pain patients.
home_introduction.text: Our rapid diagnostic test (RDT) is not just a tool; it's a strategic ally in the emergency room. By simultaneously measuring two crucial cardiac biomarkers, Heart-type Fatty Acid-Binding Protein (H-FABP) and Troponin I (cTnl), we offer clinicians a clear, early view of a patient's risk of a Major Adverse Cardiac Event (MACE) within the next 30 days. This allows for faster, more informed decision-making, optimizing hospital resources and, most importantly, improving patient outcomes.

home_benefits.title: Key Benefits at the Point of Care
home_benefits.benefit1_desc: Results in 15 minutes, enabling immediate medical action and reducing uncertainty.
home_benefits.benefit2_desc: A Negative Predictive Value (NPV) of 99.5% to confidently rule out MACE at 30 days.
home_benefits.benefit3_desc: Reduces the burden on central labs and streamlines patient flow in the emergency department.
home_benefits.benefit4_desc: Decreases unnecessary admissions and re-evaluations, saving costs and hospital resources.

home_trust.title: Built on a Foundation of Trust and Quality
home_trust.subtitle: We aren't just innovating; we're setting a new standard in cardiac diagnostics. Our credibility is built on robust manufacturing, scientific validation, and adherence to the strictest regulations.
home_trust.manufacturing_desc: Every test is manufactured in the UK by our partner Biopanda Reagents Ltd., under the strict ISO standard for medical devices.
home_trust.validation_desc: Our technology has been validated in clinical studies, proving its efficacy and accuracy in real-world settings.
home_trust.ce_desc: The product complies with European Union directives, ensuring its safety and performance.

product_header.title: Chest Pain Analyzer
product_header.subtitle: The Ultimate Tool for Cardiac Risk Stratification in the ER

product_biomarkers.title: The Power of Two: H-FABP and Troponin I
product_biomarkers.subtitle: The combination of an early diagnostic biomarker (H-FABP) with the gold standard (Troponin I) provides an unparalleled diagnostic window.
product_biomarkers.hfabp_title: H-FABP: The Early Indicator of Ischemia
product_biomarkers.hfabp_desc: H-FABP is released into the bloodstream within 30 minutes of an ischemic event, much earlier than troponin. Its early detection is crucial for identifying high-risk patients who need immediate attention.
product_biomarkers.ctnl_title: Troponin I (cTnl): The Gold Standard for Necrosis
product_biomarkers.ctnl_desc: cTnl is the preferred biomarker for detecting damage to the heart muscle (necrosis), but its elevation can take hours. It is the standard for diagnostic confirmation.

product_timeline.title: Combined Detection Window
product_timeline.subtitle: Visualize how the early detection of H-FABP complements the late confirmation of Troponin I, covering the entire spectrum of the cardiac event.

product_results.title: Clear and Simple Interpretation
product_results.subtitle: The device displays the results individually for each biomarker, allowing for a quick and unambiguous interpretation.
product_results.hfabp_positive_desc: Indicates a high risk of MACE within 30 days. Requires immediate action.
product_results.ctnl_positive_desc: Confirms the presence of myocardial damage (heart attack).
product_results.both_negative_desc: High confidence in ruling out an adverse cardiac event (NPV >99.5%).

product_guide.title: Quick Use Guide
product_guide.step1_desc: Collect the patient's whole blood, serum, or plasma sample.
product_guide.step2_desc: Apply the required amount of sample to the well of the test cassette.
product_guide.step3_desc: Wait 15 minutes for the reaction to complete.
product_guide.step4_desc: Read the result lines for H-FABP and cTnl in the viewing window.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Innovation with a human purpose.
philosophy.history_desc: Founded after more than a decade of R&D in in-vitro diagnostics for emergency cardiology.
philosophy.mission_desc: To develop innovative diagnostic solutions that improve medical efficiency and patient lives.
philosophy.vision_desc: To integrate the CHEST PAIN ANALYZER into healthcare systems worldwide within the next 5 years.
philosophy.values_desc: Human-centric R&D to optimize healthcare spending and global medical care.

ecosystem.subtitle: A connected international network for global impact.
ecosystem.spain_desc: Nerve center for global strategy, R&D, and business development.
ecosystem.uk_desc: Certified manufacturing (ISO 13485:2016) ensuring the highest quality.
ecosystem.india_desc: Operational and strategic subsidiary for the crucial Asian market.

advisory.title: Guided by Science: The Medical Advisory Board
advisory.subtitle: Clinical credibility as the cornerstone of our innovation.
advisory.text_1: At K-MARA, we operate under the guidance of a Medical Advisory Board (MAB), a standard practice in the most reputable medical device companies.
advisory.bullet_1: Ensures our products meet unmet medical needs.
advisory.bullet_2: Validates the direction of our research and development.
advisory.bullet_3: Guides our market access strategy, building trust.
advisory.doctor_role: Head of the Medical Advisory Board
advisory.doctor_desc: Cardiologist at Grupo Quirónsalud and IMED Hospitals. His leadership ensures our solutions are clinically relevant and scientifically sound.

team.member1_desc: With a degree in Information Sciences, she brings vast experience in international business development and tech companies.
team.member2_desc: Trained in Administration and Finance, she leads the global introduction of the Chest Pain Analyzer.
team.member3_role: Founder and Director of K-MARA CARE (India)
team.member3_desc: With a three-decade career, he is the cornerstone of our strategy in India and our international expansion.

stats.title: The Challenge: A Nation Under Cardiac Siege
stats.subtitle: India is facing a public health crisis of epidemic proportions. CVDs are the leading cause of mortality, affecting the population a decade earlier than in the West and causing a devastating economic impact.
stats.stat1: of the Global Burden of Heart Disease
stats.stat2: of CVD deaths occur in people under 70

team.title: Our Response: A Strategic Team
team.subtitle: To address this challenge, we have established K-MARA CARE PRIVATE LIMITED (CIN: U33119KA2022PTC160611), led by a team of experts with unparalleled influence and experience.
team.member1_value: Leads the strategic vision and merges global resources with local needs for flawless execution.
team.member2_name: Dr. B. K. Tiwary (Public Relations Director)
team.member2_value: Expert in communicating with key government officials, ministries, and agencies to facilitate adoption into the public health system.
team.member3_value: With over 35 years of experience in the Navy, he manages logistics and large-scale projects to ensure efficient distribution.
team.member4_name: Dr. N. Madana Mohan Reddy (Strategic Advisor)
team.member4_value: A cardiologist by training, he designs roadmaps for building distributor and channel partner networks.
team.member5_value: Leverages his network in pharmaceutical associations to promote product access at the community level.
team.member6_value: As leader of the Telangana Chamber of Commerce and Industry, he provides vital business influence and experience.
team.member7_value: An influential entrepreneur in Bangalore, he provides the administrative infrastructure and promotes K-MARA CARE's services.

pitch.title: Specialized Information for the Government of India
pitch.text_1: The K-MARA CARE team in India, with government relations experts like Dr. B. K. Tiwary, is prepared to collaborate with government agencies and ministries to integrate the CHEST PAIN ANALYZER into public health programs, emergency triage systems, and national tenders.
pitch.text_2: Our goal is to be a strategic partner to the Indian government in the fight against cardiovascular diseases, offering a solution that not only saves lives, but also drastically optimizes healthcare spending and aligns with national health priorities, such as the rise of telecardiology and remote patient monitoring.
pitch.bullet1_desc: Direct collaboration to combat CVD at a national level.
pitch.bullet2_desc: Reduction of healthcare spending through efficient diagnostics.
pitch.bullet3_desc: Support for national digital health priorities.

training.title: Innovation and Continuous Training
training.text_1: At K MARA Care India, we not only provide diagnostic solutions but also strengthen medical knowledge through specialized training programs.
training.text_2: Our Global Training Division, under the direction of Dr. Sekhar Kidambi, trains health professionals in the proper use of rapid diagnostic technologies, ensuring international standards and better integration into local health systems.
training.point1_desc: Results in minutes, without the need for laboratory infrastructure.
training.point2_desc: Solutions designed for the early detection of cardiovascular and metabolic diseases.
training.point3_desc: Continuous training to improve the adoption of advanced technologies.
